Package com.example.gongchapos

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.gongchapos.Application
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Drink, Order
    public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents the opening of our application as well as the connection of the application to the database Author: @author Anton Hugo Author2: @author Reid Jenkins

      • createRecipe

        public void createRecipe​(java.lang.String recipe_name,
                         boolean is_slush,
                         double med_price,
                         double large_price,
                         double recipe_price,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ingredinets,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ingredients_quantity,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toppings_array,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toppings_quantity)
        Creates a new recipe and adds it to the database
        Parameters:
        recipe_name - - the name of the recipe
        is_slush - - whether or not the recipe is a slush
        med_price - - the price of a medium drink
        large_price - - the price of a large drink
        recipe_price - - the price of the recipe
        ingredinets - - the ingredients used in the recipe
        ingredients_quantity - - the quantity of each ingredient used in the recipe
        toppings_array - - the toppings used in the recipe
        toppings_quantity - - the quantity of each topping used in the recipe

      • addDrink

        public void addDrink​(int recipe_ID,
                     java.lang.String notes,
                     boolean is_medium,
                     int ice,
                     int sugar,
                     double subtotal,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> toppings_used,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> toppings_used_quantity)
        add drink into order
        Parameters:
        recipe_ID - - the id of the recipe
        notes - - any notes given to the cashier
        is_medium - - boolean for if it is a mediums sized drink
        ice - - the ice level of the drink
        sugar - - the sugar level of the drink
        subtotal - - the subtotal of the drik
        toppings_used - - any topping used in the drink
        toppings_used_quantity - - how much of each topping was used
